Subject: National Games
data: 1 Who amongst the following was the Goodwill ambassador of the 35th National Games held in Kerela? A Saina Nehwal B Sachin Tendulkar C Leander Paes D Sania Mirza Answer: Option [B]
2 Which team is got the first position in the 35th National Games held in Kerela? A Assam B Services SCB C Manipur D Gujarat Answer: Option [B]
3 Which state will host the 36th National Games in 2016? A Goa B Maharashtra C Punjab D Manipur Answer: Option [A]
4 Who inagurated the 35th National Games held in Kerela? A Sarbananda Sonowal B Venkaiah Naidu C Narendra Modi D Rajnath Singh Answer: Option [B]
5 What was the motto of 35th National Games held in Kerela? A Together in Sport B Get Set Play C Come and Play D Yes We Can Answer: Option [B]
